title: Private Equity May Not Be the Defensive Play Some Say It Is
sub_head: Individual investors are making a potentially risky move into private-markets funds, researchers say
body:
Private-equity firms are marketing themselves to individual investors as a counterweight to volatile stock markets, arguing their funds perform better during downturns.
But some researchers question this sales pitch, pointing to buyout fundsâ€™ high leverage levels and their so-so performance in the most recent recession.
